typography.import_instruction: Import 'Unbounded' and 'JetBrains Mono' via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Unbounded:wght@400;600;800&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;700&display=swap');

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white rounded-full px-8 py-4 font-bold tracking-wide hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(127,0,255,0.5)] transition-all duration-300 hover:scale-105
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-white/20 text-white rounded-full px-8 py-4 hover:bg-white/10 transition-all duration-300 backdrop-blur-md
buttons.glow: relative overflow-hidden group bg-transparent border border-purple-500/50 text-purple-300 shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(127,0,255,0.3)] hover:shadow-[0_0_30px_rgba(127,0,255,0.6)] rounded-xl

cards.glass: bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 rounded-2xl p-8 hover:border-purple-500/30 transition-colors duration-300 relative overflow-hidden
cards.feature: group relative p-8 rounded-3xl bg-[#0F0518]/50 border border-white/5 hover:border-purple-500/50 transition-all duration-500 overflow-hidden

effects.blur_blob: absolute -z-10 w-[500px] h-[500px] bg-purple-600/20 rounded-full blur-[120px]

data_integration.guidelines: Use 'axios' to fetch data. Display: Rank, Name, Price, 24h Change (Green/Red), Market Cap, and a mini Sparkline chart using Recharts.

libraries.installation_command: yarn add framer-motion recharts lucide-react axios clsx tailwind-merge

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALLATION: Run 'yarn add framer-motion recharts lucide-react axios' immediately.
2. SETUP: Add the Google Fonts import to 'src/index.css'. Set 'body' background to #030014 and text to white.
3. NAVBAR: Create a sticky glassmorphism navbar. Links: Home, Features, Roadmap, Live Market (Link to /market).
4. HERO: Use 'hero_bg' as a background image with a heavy black gradient overlay (to ensure text readability). Center the H1 'The Future of Decentralized Wealth' in 'Unbounded' font.
5. FEATURES: Use a Bento Grid layout. Create a component <FeatureCard /> that tilts on hover (framer-motion).
6. LIVE MARKET PAGE: Create a route '/market'. Fetch data from CoinGecko. Use a high-density table layout. Columns: Coin, Price, 24h %, Mkt Cap. Sparkline chart for last 7 days.
7. ANIMATIONS: Every section must stagger-fade in. Buttons must glow on hover.
8. THEME: ENFORCE DARK MODE. Do not create a light mode switch. This is crypto.
9. TOASTS: Use 'sonner' for any notifications (e.g. 'Invest' button click).
universal_guidelines: NEVER use generic 'blue' for links. Use the brand cyan or pink.
ALWAYS add internal padding to bordered containers.
Ensure 24h Price Change colors are distinct: Green (#10B981) for positive, Red (#EF4444) for negative.
